name: Shield Block
description: Reduces damage equal to your shield's AC.

name: Shield Other
description: Grants close ally a bonus to AC equal to your shield for one round.

name: Cleaving Attack
description: Attack close enemies in front of you with one swipe, -3 to damage roll.

name: Precise Attack
description: -1 to damage rolls, +1 to attack rolls.

name: Power Attack
description: -1 to attack rolls, +1 to damage rolls.

name: Empower Spell
description: +1 DC to spell cast, +1 dice added to spell.

name: Extend Spell
description: +1 DC to spell cast, focused spells extend to one additional target.

name: Maximize Spell
description: +3 DC to spell cast, maximum dice rolls.

name: Transform Spell
description: +1 DC to spell cast, changes spell's elemental damage type to another.

name: Lucky
description: Grants a luck token at the beginning of each session.
